name: PURR-DERERS
description:
Ever since Chickenpaw was a small kitten, the warriors told stories of the hostile cats living near the clan, on the other side of the borders. They would not give the cats names but Chickenpaw’s brother would. He’d call them “purr-derers" and even just hearing the name made Chickenpaw shiver.

Chickenpaw, however, is not smart. As soon as the small apprentice had gained enough courage, he decided to seek out the so-called “purr-derers” and figure out why they were so feared amongst the apprentices.

The only problem here was that the only cats living on the other side of the border were boring but hostile enemy warriors. Surely they couldn’t be the "purr-derers", right?

Take part in Chickenpaw’s adventure as he tries to uncover the secrets of the forest. There are plenty of things to discover - the origins of the horror stories told about the “purr-derers”, the secrets that Chickenpaw’s clan is hiding from everyone.

You could...
  • Get to to know Meadowdance, the shy but wise healer of Chickenpaw's clan, who is getting tired of the constant fighting and problems the warriors cause on their silly little adventures.
  • Introduce yourself to the enemy warriors, who are are harder to befriend than a pack of wolves.
Features
  • Multiple characters that you'll get to know on your adventure.
  • A simple battle mechanic.

[ NOTE: A game created for the game mockup jam. This is not a working game; I mainly found the game jam really interesting and wanted to feature some of my friends’ characters. Thank you! ]
